thread.title: Massive green fireball hurtling through sky sparks fears of missile launch and aliens | Daily Star
thread.title_full: Massive green fireball hurtling through sky sparks fears of missile launch and aliens | Daily Star

author: Nicole Stinson
title: Massive green fireball hurtling through sky sparks fears of missile launch and aliens | Daily Star
text:
Massive green fireball hurtling through sky sparks fears of missile launch and aliens Massive green fireball hurtling through sky sparks fears of missile launch and aliens A HUGE green fireball spotted flying through the night sky sparked fears of a missile launch – and aliens. / Published 7th February 2017 
Stunning footage captured on a police dash camera shows a green shooting star as it lit up the night sky. 
But the unique phenomenon sparked fear among local residents who were initially confused by the sighting at 1.30am on Monday. 
North Korean leader Kim Jong-un’s promise to launch a long range ballistic missile and Iran’s missile test appeared to be on the mind of one witness who feared it was a nuke. 
Joseph Abu C said: “I was driving home from the gym when I saw that thing – it scare the s*** out of me. 
FACEBOOK/US NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE/ GETTY MYSTERIOUS: A green fireball sparked fears of a missile launch and alien invasion “I thought for sure it was aliens” Beto Fernandez 
“I thought it was a ballistic missile or something else.” 
Jeanne Nickell Tobie added: “I saw this also – scared the heck out of me as I couldn’t figure out what that could be. So bizarre.” 
Some viewers believed the fireball was a sign of aliens. 
GETTY/YOUTUBE WAR: President Trump said 'nothing is off the table' after Iran's missile launch Related Articles
